summary: Backend testing completed for CuePartner voice cue reader. All 12 tests passed - AI voice generation, video download, direct submission with Resend email, share links, and email status endpoints all working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Test takes created and cleaned up during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend features verified working: (1) GET /api/email/status returns configured=true with sender=onboarding@resend.dev, (2) GET /api/projects/{id}/takes returns takes with video_url for download, (3) POST /api/projects/{id}/generate-all-audio works (returns 0 if no pending cue lines), (4) POST /api/projects/{id}/takes/{take_id}/submit sends email via Resend and creates share link, (5) GET /api/shared/{token} returns shared take data. Test user: actor@demo.com/actor123, project_id: e2aedaa7-dd93-439c-bc8c-2f7b99c76adc

video_download.details: Returns takes with video_url (base64 data URL) that can be downloaded

ai_voice_generation.details: Endpoint functional, returns generated_count=0 when no cue lines need audio

direct_submission.details: Creates share link AND sends email via Resend (email_sent=true)

share_link_access.details: Returns project_title, take data with video_url, views count
